biotools.summary: IDAM provides a framework for the identification of microbial disease-associated biomarkers based on metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data. The raw sequencing data (matched metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data) or the expression matrix is required. The output is gene modules consisting of gene and sample subsets.
